verses:
O most holy one, O most lowly one, Loving Virgin, Maria!
Mother, Maid of fairest love, Lady, Queen of all above,
Ora, ora pro nobis!

Virgin ever fair. Mother, hear our prayer, Look upon uus, Maria!
Bring to us your treasure, Grace beyond all measure; Ora,
ora pro nobis!
alternative_verses:
O sanctissima, O piissima, Dulcis Virgo Maria!
Mater amáta, intemeráta. Ora, ora pro nobis!

Virgo, réspice; Mater, ádspice. Audi nos, O Maria!
Tu medicinam portas divinam. Ora, ora pro nobis!
